channel.title: Strong motion monitor on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in Strong motion monitor on Some Title

item.title: It is very fast if you receive the Earthquake Early Warning with a strong motion monitor and handle it with JSON
item.description: ## Overview POST JSON to the Python web server from the Chrome extension “strong motion monitor” Cook the received JSON and throw it to Discord’s webhook, Slack, etc. (POST) Fast, cheap, delicious How fast it is, it is output to the channel of Discord at the moment when the breaking news is received on the strong motion monitor of the macbook Assumptions Operation has been confirmed with CentOS7 and Python3.
